documents.document: @MichaelWilsonCo me too. I first thought it was a transformer exploding until I heard the thunder.

Fun fact: when the Alex Fraser Bridge opened in 1986 it was four lanes. By the early 90s it was expanded to six. In 2018: 7 w/counterflow.

Some people are applauding some of Trump's comments in the background of the Q&A at his news conference.
Trump still refuses to release tax returns, again says "still under audit" - "The only people who care about my tax returns are reporters"
"Over the weekend I was offered $2-billion to do a deal in Dubai 'with a very very amazing man' and I turned it down" - Trump
"I have no deals in Russia. I have no deals that could happen in Russia, and I have no loans with Russia." - Trump
Trump: I tell people all the time to be aware 'tiny cameras' could be watching what they're doing, "You could end up on the nightly news"
"If Putin likes Donald Trump, I consider that an asset, not a liability." Trump, "Do you honestly believe Hillary would be tougher on Putin"
"Hackings are bad and hacking shouldn't be done. But look at the things that were found in that hacking!" - Trump
"The DNC was totally open to be hacked. They did a very poor job. They could have had hacking defense like we had." - Trump
"Probably China," Trump adds
Trump: "I think it was Russia, but I think we also got hacked by other countries." @NEWS1130
"I will be the greatest jobs producer that God ever created" .. says @realDonaldTrump
